about_the_game:
Gameplay

Hope's Final Defense is an action roguelite where you create a skill deck to fight hordes of enemies. Choose from many game-breaking items and upgrades. Craft overpowered builds and create deadly synergies to fight endless monsters from Negativia. Can you protect humanity's last hope?

Strategize Skills for Devastating Combos

Skills are like using cards, they can create incredible combos. Strategize how to arrange skills for maximum damage.

Choose Upgrades and Craft Items

Every run offers different choices of upgrades, items, and skills. Choose carefully to create different combinations and experiences every time.

Customizable Playstyles

Build your character to different playstyles with Blessings.

Features

  • Each character is unique, with their own active and passive skill, with over 35 unique upgrades. Even with the same skill there could be different ways to play it.
  • Over 20 powerful items to combine. Each with effects that alter how to craft your build.
  • Many unique enemies with their own attacks.
  • You can choose different heros to play as, if you don't have fun with one, have fun with the next one!
  • After beating a difficulty, you can try the next one.
